page.title: 16ANGLERS in TRENCH,TELFORD.
page.content: Mr. Price is chairman of Summerfield Angling Club and has Â£600 worth of tackle.He fishes both Trench and Middle Pools but prefers Trench Pool because the fish are bigger! The heaviest fish caught in Trench Pool was a carp weighing 14kg.The pool is well-known for its pike - the largest caught weighed 10kg.The most commonly used baits used here are maggots,bread luncheon meat and worms.Mr.Price likes to go fishing at dawn on a summer day. He often enters competitions and has won 10 trophies. Mr. McLeod goes fishing once a week, usually for about 6 hours.He does not belong to a club.He uses a fibre-glass rod and the same baits as Mr.Price.He also enjoys fishing early on a summer day but prefers to fish Middle Pool as there are more fish there even though they are smaller!
